lead_paragraph: A teenager who raped and killed his high school math teacher was sentenced Friday to life in prison with eligibility for parole in 40 years.

headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Life Term for Teacher’s Teenage Killer
headline.main: Massachusetts: Life Term for Teacher’s Teenage Killer

snippet: A teenager who raped and killed his high school math teacher was sentenced Friday to life in prison with eligibility for parole in 40 years.
abstract: Teenager Philip Chism is sentenced to life in prison for 2013 rape and murder of his teacher Colleen Ritzer at Danvers High School in Massachusetts; Chism will be eligible for parole in 40 years.
